resources.string: I am very much interested in building mobile apps which can do various functionalities and ease a lot of peoples work.I am very curious about how we can implement AI in Mobile applications
Currently studying masters at The University of Texas at Dallas. My major is Computer Science specialization in Intelligent Systems.

I have worked as iOS developer in RS Labs where I worked on the products of one of the top company where I fixed many bugs for that product as well as helped my team lead in creating new feature for that product
